recommendations: Jehan Samarathunga â€œVardhman is a cool manager who always has a smile on his face and a coffee in his hand. I met Vardhman during my time at Uber Colombo. He was well liked by everyone he was managing under him. Although we were on different teams, I had the pleasure of working together on certain projects and I liked every minute of it due to how cool headed he was and how easy it was to share ideas and communicate with him.â€

Jonah McLachlan â€œPersonally mentored Vardhman in UX research over the last 4 months. His aptitude and hunger for learning is a credit to him.
